Articles.Content:
Hello everybody, it's been a long time since I've been playing this game, and today is the day I'm gonna show all of you what kind of space junk can I build. Also, I would appreciate all the help you can provide me, since I did all of this without following any guide and I know it's far from being perfect.

Ok, let's get started. My main program is called "Discover". I have two models, one made for planets with atmosphere and the other one for planets without it.

-Discover 5c (No atmosphere):

Details:

Weight: 717.8 tons (<3)

Part count: 196

Stages: 6

Fuel: 49860

Electric Charge: 1088

MonoPropellant: 330

Struts: Lots of them

Features:

-Can land on any planet with no atmosphere, no return (Didn't tried with Eeloo yet).

-Deployable rover.

-Full of science tools.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Link: https://www./?lsf57rtsirl48ly

-Discover 6c

Details:

Weight: 723.88 tons (<33)

Part count: 198

Stages: 9

Fuel: 49770

Electric Charge: 5915

MonoPropellant: - (I'm planning to add it)

Struts: Even more

Features:

-Can land on any planet with atmosphere.

-Deployable rover.

-Deployable Lab. (Sometimes it dissapears before landing (???))

-Full of science tools.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Link: https://www./?qt49cxrutha7amb

-General Instructions:

Keep the thrust power of the first stage below 1200 or it will blow up.

When landing on a planet with atmosphere, decouple the lab BEFORE landing (obviously)

I will add a guide with pics very soon.

Edited February 15, 2014 by Myrkul
Those seem like quite reasonable designs, but how about more pics of them in action? Especially the deployable sub-ships.
